content: Father of Stones is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight soon after you reach the Heights of Ember in Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Father_of_Stones.md", under the primary heading "Father of Stones". The content is presented below:

Father of Stones is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight soon after you reach the Heights of Ember in Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong.
